name: cities_v2_get_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airvisual.
Tool description: Query for Air Pollution Data, Weather information, Health Recommendations, etc... as on the official application
API description: Fetches information about a specific city using its identifier.

is_id.description: The value of id field (type is city) that returned in â€¦/v2/auto-complete endpoint

x_units_temperature.description: Unit for temperature. One of 'fahrenheit' or 'celsius'. Defaults to 'celsius'.

x_aqi_index.description: AQI (Air Quality Index) standard. One of 'us' or 'cn'. Defaults to 'us'.

x_units_pressure.description: Unit for pressure. One of 'hg' or 'mbar'. Defaults to 'mbar'.

x_units_distance.description: Unit for distance. One of 'miles' or 'kilometer'. Defaults to 'kilometer'.
